Unnecessary files(?)

--one of these two 'test' directories is probably necessary since we dont want to keep re-configuring tests to run this. for now. -KB
    --Both tests were generated by android studio and at initial glance appear to serve two different purposes -JSL
app/src/androidTest --This test appears to be unit test for app functionality such as clicking buttons -JSL
app/src/test --This test appears to be unit tests for code functions such as math or question master actually checking answers as expected -JSL


--I think these only need to be kept locally: -KB
    --I agree, mine is added to .gitignore by default -JSL
